name: Collision Course (itch) (ffellner, Tamazi)
description:
Controls:

A/D or Left/Right to move.

If your control is below 25%, steering gets harder. Pick up steering wheels to gain control.

You have to be careful not to hit anything, or you'll quickly explode. Although traffic cones might not look that dangerous to you, look out for them!

For the best experience, download the file for your operating system,  unpack it and start the executable. May lag in the browser.
